title: LUV-Balian
summary: Take it easy at this unique and tranquil getaway, enjoy your time by relaxing massage and the menu will spoil you with the options to have your favorite food in the villa.

reviews.text:
After being in Bali for 2.5 weeks we needed some private time with the kids. We had the most amazing time here. The best airbnb we have ever stayed in. So quiet and peaceful. The pool is incredible. We hire a scooter to go surfing only 5 minutes to the ‚Äútown‚Äù but you can get some great delivery food options so you don‚Äôt have to leave. 
Breakfast was amazing ü§ç we will definitely come back and recommend to all of our friends. Definitely stay here if you can we loved it so much. 
Thanks for having us

What a fantastic cabin in the jungle! It was like a tiny house with a pool but immaculately done. I‚Äôm a 5 star bunny and I was in love with this property. The bed with perfectly comfy, air con crispy cool, big tv to watch Netflix. The pool and jungle was all very lush and even though it rained it was super relaxing. The drive in was a little steep in parts but we were just in a normal rental car and managed fine. Also Putu lovely housekeeper and breakfast very simple but yum. Highly recommend!

We loved our stay at this brand new airbnb. Komang was very accommodating and let us check in one hour earlier and we could stay one hour longer as we had a late evening flight. There is breakfast included in the room price, which is served or cooked in the Villa. The villa is private and surrounded by beautiful nature. The road can be heard, but the jungle has his own wonderful sounds so it didnt bother us. Villa was spot clean and had everything we needed for our stay.

Staying at Komangs place was the perfect start to our Bali journey. The little house is even prettier than on the pictures, perfectly clean and offers a great view over the Balinese ‚Äújungle‚Äù. Komang, our host, was very friendly and proactive in our communication. Additionally to the stay, very good breakfast was offered daily while we were even able to choose between many different options. 
We highly enjoyed our stay, would definitely rebook and recommend this place!

Komang's villa  is such a nice space. It is only a few minutes drive from the beach but in the middle of the jungle! The view from the pool at sunset is incredible. 
Komang herself is a very kind and attentive host, she made sure we that we had everything we needed!
The space is clean, comfortable and well designed. This is by far one of the nicest spots we have stayed at and found it very relaxing. Will definitely return!

Komang was a superb host. Always responsive. This was one of the best Airbnb I‚Äôve ever stayed in. Beautiful surroundings. Great accommodation. Breakfast included is superb. Komang will order your lunch/ dinner for you from local restaurants. Lovely small infinity pool. Quiet. There is a beach a 20 minute walk away but there‚Äôs not much else going on. It‚Äôs a very secluded and quiet location. Perfect for relaxing.

Komang was the perfect host. This home is a little of the tourist track but if you want peaceful and beautiful surroundings this is the place. 
Komang goes out of her way to make sure you have everything you need. 
Helping with every aspect of your stay. Putu was a pleasure to cook your breakfast in the morning and wayan the perfect driver to show you sights. A hideaway gem.

We stayed at a few Airbnbs on this trip and this place was my favourite. If you‚Äôre looking for a retreat in the hills this is it. My partner got sick while we were there and Komang and her team looked after us so well. Emma made us a delicious breakfast every day and we had the best massage of our Bali trip here too! Highly reccomend.

Komang was a great host and was helpful all throughout my stay. I arrived in the evening and hadn‚Äôt had dinner, and Komang was able to help arrange delivery so I didn‚Äôt need to head into town (not possible at that time via app). The house was lovely, and I liked going down the hill to spend time by the river. Very good breakfast too!

Komang, everything was perfect and spotlessly clean. I honestly don‚Äôt know what to add to what previous guests have already said. It was a dream, and we wish we could have stayed forever. You and Putu are wonderful people. Every morning, we enjoyed a fresh breakfast, and the communication was excellent. Thank you for everything!

The perfect getaway from busy and touristy places. Amazing nature and total privacy. 
Everything was as described and the pictures didn‚Äôt do it justice. It‚Äôs even more beautiful in reality.
Komang was very helpful as well and provided pickup and scooter rental as well as useful tips for the Area. 
Thank you!!

The accommodation exceeded our expectations. It was like a little paradise. Komang was very helpful and keen to making our stay wonderful. I can highly recommend to order an in-house massage! It was even the best massage of our lives. We really enjoyed our stay there, it was very relaxing.

The villa is completely private, feels like your own little oasis surrounded by nature. Komang is an excellent host, always responds quickly and helps you with anything from recommendations to arranging transportation. I‚Äôll definitely be back next time I‚Äôm in Bali!

Thank you Komang for this exceptional and beautiful stay at your villa. Villa was even better than in pictures. Komang helped with arranging everything you needed. This place will stay our minds, thank you. Highly recommended if you need space and peace.

Perfect house! Wonderful people! Amazing food! Beautiful Views! Wouldn‚Äôt change anything! Loved it so much that I booked another stay in a few weeks! Can not recommend it enough. You have to stay here!!

Thoroughly enjoyed staying in this secluded villa looking out into the jungle, while listening to nature and the flowing river below.
rested and recharged after 6 days of bliss

It was really nice!  A little beautiful home, on top of little hill. There are a lot of extra services that aren't even in the description!
Breakfast was also included....

Amazing place, feels like home! 
Beautiful people, I‚Äôll be back ‚ò∫Ô∏è

highlights.description: This home is one of the highest ranked based on ratings, reviews, and reliability.

highlights.title: Dive right in
highlights.description: This is one of the few places in the area with a pool.

highlights.title: Exceptional check-in experience
highlights.description: Recent guests gave the check-in process a 5-star rating.
